about_the_game:
Explore, build, fight! Wieldo is a procedural open-world building game with a healthy amount of sword wielding combat.

Build all the things


The world is yours to make over. From convenient contraptions to beautiful sceneries, activate your build mode and take advantage of the unlimited supply of blocks to edit the world to your liking. 🎨 Extend your block palette by engaging with all the content the world has to offer.

Fight all the monsters


Face the challenge of the shrines of combat and refine your combat skills. Keep triumphing and be met with increasing resistance, until you collect the rewards of the mighty bosses! Or die trying 💀 They’re dangerous, you’ve been warned.

Explore all the places

The world you spawn in has been procedurally generated just for you! All the biomes have something unique to offer. 🎁 Get ready for a series of block palette extensions and new effects to use in your builds.

Bring all the friends


Wieldo is a multiplayer co-op game, share a world with your friends! Help each other out or build silly contraptions. 🤡 There is always something fun to do when surrounded by friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 Six-Core or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The current requirement is a very safe one. It will be narrowed down as development goes on.

short_description: Wield your sword and your creativity to survive in this procedural world. Fight to build. Build to fight. Bring some friends and make it home 🏠
